# FindTaggedPagesModel.FindPagesAsync method

FindTaggedPages pages matching a search criterion in the background.

```csharp
internal Task FindPagesAsync(string query, SearchScope scope)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| query | query. If null or empty just all page tags are collected |
| scope | Range of the search |
